name: blowhole
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an opening in the top of the head of a whale (= very large sea mammal), through which it breathes
mantaphoto/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
geology
  specialized a hole in the ground that connects to a cave opening into the sea
